Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-44487 affecting package kata-containers-cc for versions less than 0.6.1-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-44487 affecting package kata-containers-cc for versions less than 0.6.1-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package kata-containers-cc is earlier than 0.6.1-2, affected by CVE-2023-44487
